item.title: NAGASE Personal Care website is now OPEN!
item.description: We are pleased to announce the launch of our brand new website catering for our customers.

item.title: Beauty Protection showcase at in-cosmetics 2017!
item.description: NAGASE Personal Care will be at in-cosmetics® global on 4-6 April 2017, in London.

item.title: NAGASE Personal Care will be at PCHi 2017 Guangzhou, China!
item.description: Please visit us at this year's PCHi Guangzhou on 21-23 February 2017.
